channel.title: I think this is correct section
channel.description:
I [b]Am[/b] aware of this rule but i think this is a question to do with a server.
1. All topics in this section must be requests for help on a server. Any non-server related question will be locked.
Well, How do i set up a Paypal account so i can get donaters on my server so i can go DEDI when i've finished my RUNESCAPE RSPS Donater's will not be called DONATER's they will have the proper knwon status..Member and will have all member privelages..

item.title: I think this is correct section
item.dc:creator: @Psycotix Psycotix
item.description:
@Psycotix wrote:

You’re basically selling membership?
“Donators will not be called donators, the proper known status… Members”
//You need to have a credit-card by the way

Read full topic

item.title: I think this is correct section
item.dc:creator: @Fat_Cookies Fat Cookies
item.description:
@Fat_Cookies wrote:

paypal.com

Bargeldloses Bezahlen - Online Shopping | PayPal DE

Mit PayPal einfach und sicher bargeldlos bezahlen, Zahlungen empfangen & Geld senden. Profitieren auch Sie vom Käuferschutz & Verkäuferschutz.


Click sign up, make an account and you simply tell your Donators your billing E-mail address and then they can send you money.

This is nothing to do with a server.

Read full topic
